headline: Jackson Pollock
instructions: Before you start, make sure you’re in the lesson you wanted and that you’ve got all the materials needed. If not, ask an adult to help you out.
Watch this lesson’s video. It’s super fun! Remember to take breaks!
Read any extra material given. It may even be a book you already have!
After you’ve finished, click on “Finish lesson” at the top of the page. Complete the mini quiz just to make sure you’ve learned! This will unlock so many lessons or scholarships for you!
